src:
3 Tim Lolos Babak 16 Besar Liga Champions, Siapa Saja?
07 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Fase penyisihan grup Liga Champions baru saja menyelesaikan matchday keempat. Masih ada dua pertandingan tersisa. Namun, sejauh ini sudah ada tiga klub yang memastikan lolos ke babak 16 Besar.
Tim pertama yang dipastikan lolos adalah PSG. Klub asal Prancis baru saja meraih kemenangan dengan skor 1-0 atas Club Brugge pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. PSG menang berkat gol tunggal Mauro Icardi.
PSG kini berada di puncak klasemen Grup A dengan raihan 12 poin. PSG selalu menang dalam empat laga yang sudah dimainkan, termasuk melawan Real Madrid. PSG mengalahkan Los Blancos dengan skor 3-0 pada laga di Parc des Princes.
Dengan meraih 12 poin, maka PSG tidak mungkin dikejar Club Brugge yang berada di posisi ke-3 klasemen dengan dua poin. Real Madrid yang berada di posisi kedua klasemen Grup A, dengan meraih 7 poin, punya peluang besar lolos ke babak 16 Besar.
text:
3 teams pass the Round of 16 of the Champions League, anyone?
Nov 7, 2019, 08:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The Champions League group stage has just completed its fourth matchday. There are still two matches left. However, so far there have been three clubs that have made sure to qualify for the Round of 16.
The first team to be confirmed to have passed was PSG. The French club has just won with a score of 1-0 over Club Brugge on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. PSG won thanks to Mauro Icardi's single goal.
PSG are now top of Group A with 12 points. PSG has always won in the four matches that have been played, including against Real Madrid. PSG defeated Los Blancos 3-0 in the match at the Parc des Princes.
By winning 12 points, it is impossible for PSG to be chased by Club Brugge who are in the 3rd position of the standings with two points. Real Madrid, who are second in Group A, with 7 points, have a great chance of qualifying for the Round of 16.
